DOC.brief_summary: A six-month RCT conduct within 36 health centre throughout urban rural Nepal . The purpose RCT test effectiveness peer comparison intervention increase uptake long-acting reversible contraceptive ( LARCs ) percentage PAFP uptake among client receive safe abortion Marie Stopes International Nepal . The total sample size ~12,000 safe abortion client . The primary outcome interest LARCs among safe abortion client Marie Stopes Centres Nepal . The secondary outcome evaluate impact behaviorally design intervention service provider ' engagement discussing measure increase PAFP LARC uptake among woman .
